messages.subject: Re: Mirror Mirror on sale now!
messages.msgSnippet: MIRROR, MIRROR has received a STELLAR review here http://www.paranormalromance.org/reviews/review.php?id=25215 You can check out the vid trailer for this book
messages.messageBody:
MIRROR, MIRROR has received a STELLAR review here
http://www.paranormalromance.org/reviews/review.php?id=25215

You can check out the vid trailer for this book at
http://www.barbarasheridan.net/chloemichelle/index.htm

It is a book for young adults, however an older audience interested in
the era and looking for some adventure will also like this story.

THERE IS FUNDOSHI IN THIS STORY.

DO YOU HERE ME FANGIRLS? CLASSIC MALE UNDERWEAR IS IN THIS STORY...but
you musn't skip ahead in the book to find that scene otherwise you
would be cheating (^_^)

The book can be purchased as an e-book here:
http://www.mardigraspublishing.com/mirrormirror.html

the paperback comes out in July 2007

I will be posting my review of the work later...as soon as I finish a
few things...




--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Anne" <annecain369@...> wrote:
>
> Barb's YA novel "Mirror, Mirror" is on sale now! *pokes her for not
> sharing the news*
>
> http://www.mardigraspublishing.com/mirrormirror.html
>
> Anyone familiar with anime and manga--especially Kenshin and
> Peacemaker fans--will have a lot of fun, especially with the
> Shinsengumi cameos. "Mirror, Mirror" is one of my fave stories by Barb
> and I hope y'all enjoy it too!
>
> ~Anne
> http://www.dragonsdisciple.com
>

messages.subject: Mirror Mirror on sale now!
messages.msgSnippet: Barb s YA novel Mirror, Mirror is on sale now! *pokes her for not sharing the news* http://www.mardigraspublishing.com/mirrormirror.html Anyone familiar with
messages.messageBody:
Barb's YA novel "Mirror, Mirror" is on sale now! *pokes her for not
sharing the news*

http://www.mardigraspublishing.com/mirrormirror.html

Anyone familiar with anime and manga--especially Kenshin and
Peacemaker fans--will have a lot of fun, especially with the
Shinsengumi cameos. "Mirror, Mirror" is one of my fave stories by Barb
and I hope y'all enjoy it too!

~Anne
http://www.dragonsdisciple.com
